name: Jean ZEPPI, Appellee v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellant

judges: Before: CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
parties: Jean ZEPPI, Appellee v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Thomas Frank Jakubiak, Harrisburg, for Pa. State Police, appellant.
Pasco L. Schiavo, Hazleton, for Jean Zeppi, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
863 A.2d 428
Jean ZEPPI, Appellee v. PENNSYLVANIA STATE POLICE, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.

Decided Dec. 21, 2004.
Thomas Frank Jakubiak, Harrisburg, for Pa. State Police, appellant.

Before: CAPPY, C.J., CASTILLE, NIGRO, NEWMAN, SAYLOR, EAKIN and BAER, JJ.
